mapper.select: SELECT DEVICE.DEVID as device_id, DEVICE.DEVNAME as device_name, DEVICE.DEVCLASSID as device_class_id, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPNAME as property_name, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPTAGID as property_tagid, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPRULE as client_rule, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPCONST as constant_value, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPRESULTTYPE as result_type, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCNAME as command_name, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCTAGID as command_tagid FROM DEVICE LEFT OUTER JOIN DEVICEPROPERTY ON DEVICE.DEVID = DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPDEVID INNER JOIN DEVICECOMMAND ON DEVICE.DEVID = DEVICECOMMAND.DVCDEVID

SELECT DEVICE.DEVID as device_id, DEVICE.DEVNAME as device_name, DEVICE.DEVCLASSID as device_class_id, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPNAME as property_name, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPTAGID as property_tagid, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPRULE as client_rule, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPCONST as constant_value, DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPRESULTTYPE as result_type, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCNAME as command_name, DEVICECOMMAND.DVCTAGID as command_tagid FROM DEVICE LEFT OUTER JOIN DEVICEPROPERTY ON DEVICE.DEVID = DEVICEPROPERTY.DVPDEVID INNER JOIN DEVICECOMMAND ON DEVICE.DEVID = DEVICECOMMAND.DVCDEVID WHERE DEVICE.DEVID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEVICE (DEVID, DEVNAME, DEVCLASSID) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{deviceClassId})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM DEVICE WHERE DEVID = #{id}
